tasks.label: Setup Python Environment (uv)
tasks.command: pip3 install uv && uv venv && export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/workspaces/ai-toolkit-mpb/integrations/mcp-memgraph/src:/workspaces/ai-toolkit-mpb/memgraph-toolbox/src && source .venv/bin/activate && uv pip install -e .[test]

tasks.label: Run All Integration Tests (local)
args: docker run --rm -d -p 7687:7687 --name memgraph memgraph/memgraph-mage:latest --schema-info-enabled=True --telemetry-enabled=false; sleep 5; (cd memgraph-toolbox && uv venv && uv pip install -e .[test] && uv run pytest .) || true; (cd integrations/mcp-memgraph && uv venv && uv pip install -e .[test] && uv run pytest .) || true; (cd integrations/langchain-memgraph && uv venv && uv pip install -e .[test] && uv run pytest .) || true;

tasks.label: Run MCP Integration Tests (local)
args: docker run --rm -d -p 7687:7687 --name memgraph memgraph/memgraph-mage:latest --schema-info-enabled=True --telemetry-enabled=false; sleep 5; (uv run pytest integrations/mcp-memgraph/tests) || true;
